sentences.en: Eight - year - old Griffin Stevens made the shot of a lifetime this past weekend.
sentences.cn: 8 岁 的格里芬史蒂文斯在本周末创造了一次一生难忘的投篮.

sentences.en: Freyda: My duty also lies with the Griffin Empire.
sentences.cn: 法蕾妲: 我的衷心和职责与狮鹫帝国同在.

sentences.en: Griffin Mill : Can we talk about something other than Hollywood for a change? We're educated people.
sentences.cn: 格里芬·尔: 我们能不能别再谈好莱坞了? 我们都是有教养的人.

sentences.en: He must have foreseen that she would be the queen of the Griffin Empire one day.
sentences.cn: 他肯定已经预料到伊莎贝尔终有一天会成为狮鹫帝国的女皇.

sentences.en: How many Griffin soldiers died with him?
sentences.cn: 你知道随他战死的士兵有多少 吗 ?

sentences.en: Isabel: As does the Griffin Empire.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔: 狮鹫帝国也同样需要你.

sentences.en: Kemp announced that he could not hear Griffin's heartbeats.
sentences.cn: 肯普宣布他听不到格里芬的心脏跳动了.

sentences.en: MERV GRIFFIN DIES AT 82 AND DIES WITH SECRET OF WHETHER HE WAS GAYq ORyNOT!
sentences.cn: 格里?m作家去世享年82和模具的秘密他是否是同性或不!

sentences.en: Mr Griffin gave a regretful smile.
sentences.cn: 格里芬先生遗憾地笑了笑。

sentences.en: Mr Griffin jerked forward in his chair.
sentences.cn: 格里芬先生坐在椅子上猛地向前一凑。

sentences.en: Mr Griffin made a jerky gesture.
sentences.cn: 格里芬先生急匆匆地做了个手势。

sentences.en: The basic methods of tranportation were shown to me, including Griffin rides.
sentences.cn: 我也看到了基本的交通工具, 包括乘坐狮鹫兽.

sentences.en: The man's name was Fred Griffin After getting Fred untangled from the boat.
sentences.cn: 这个受伤的男人叫弗雷德·格里芬.吉米把弗雷德和小船分离开.
葛列芬先生,考虑考虑吧.

sentences.en: We thought a cruise on Lake Burley Griffin might be rather nice.
sentences.cn: 我们想在burleyGriffin湖上游览会很有意思.

trans.tran_cn: 格里芬（姓氏； Walter Burley, 1876-1937，美国建筑家）
